import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import './UserDetails.css'; import {faPlusSquare} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import PopupUsers from '../Components/PopupUsers'; import 'react-calendar/dist/Calendar.css'; import './Team.css' const UserDetails = () => { const [visibility, setVisibility] = useState(false); let { id } = useParams(); let {first_name} =useParams(); //-----------FECH ALL DATA to const userdetails = [ {id: 1 , seminar: "seminar1", duration: 30, starting_date: "1/7/2021" }, {id: 2 , seminar: "seminar2", duration: 15, starting_date: "1/7/2021" }, {id: 3 , seminar: "seminar3", duration: 20, starting_date: "15/5/2020" }, {id: 4 , seminar: "seminar4", duration: 7, starting_date: "15/5/2020" }, {id: 5 , seminar: "seminar5", duration: 20, starting_date: "15/5/2020"}, {id: 6 , seminar: "seminar6", duration: 30, starting_date: "3/10/2019" }, {id: 7 , seminar: "seminar7", duration: 30, starting_date: "1/7/2021" }, {id: 8 , seminar: "seminar8", duration: 30, starting_date: "15/5/2020 "}, {id: 9 , seminar: "seminar9", duration: 30, starting_date: "1/7/2021" }, {id: 10 , seminar: "seminar10", duration: 30, starting_date: "3/10/2019" }, {id: 11 , seminar: "seminar2", duration: 15, starting_date: "1/7/2021" }, {id: 12 , seminar: "seminar3", duration: 20, starting_date: "15/5/2020" }, {id: 13 , seminar: "seminar4", duration: 7, starting_date: "15/5/2020 "}, {id: 14 , seminar: "seminar5", duration: 20, starting_date: "1/7/2021"}, {id: 15 , seminar: "seminar6", duration: 30, starting_date: "15/5/2020" }, {id: 16 , seminar: "seminar7", duration: 30, starting_date: "15/5/2020" }, {id: 17 , seminar: "seminar8", duration: 30, starting_date: "1/7/2021" }, {id: 18 , seminar: "seminar9", duration: 30, starting_date: "15/5/2020" }, ]; //--------------------- Pop Up ------------------------- const popupCloseHandler = () => { setVisibility(false); }; return (

{first_name}

Last Name: Doe

Email: Test@test.com

Manager: Some Managers

{userdetails.map( (detail) => ( ))}
Seminars setVisibility(true)} icon={faPlusSquare}/> Duration Starting Date
{detail.seminar} {detail.duration} {detail.starting_date}
) } export default UserDetails
